context: Hi how are you ! What kind of movies do you like ?!
Good. Tell me your three favorite movies so I can make good recommendations
I really like Inception (2010) Enough (2002) and Vacation (2015)
Have you seen The Abyss (1989) The Shining (1980) and Meet the Fockers (2004) ?
I only seen Meet the Fockers (2004) !!! Hilarious movie omg And Meet the Parents (2000)
I liked meet the parents too. How about Lars and the Real Girl (2007) ?
Hmm never seen it I will have to add it to my list
You might like it if you liked Meet the Parents (2000) and you might like Father of the Bride (1991) as well
I seen Father of the Bride (1991) ! Super good
resp: It was!!! I also really like The Other Woman (2014) Had me rolling on the floor
